to all the people asking how to watch the movie:

1.create a dvd with two files in in it. one named VIDEO_TS and one named AUDIO_TS.
2. put all those files of the torrent in the VIDEO_TS file,
3. burn it.

Igf you use nero and choose NEW->DVD video, it will automatickly create these folders for you.
